entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the evening. Blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 09 March 2023
